title: PermaFrost NMR Product Formulations
purpose: Document the 5 product formulations and their applications

dx_mineral.name: PermaFrost NMR DX Mineral
dx_mineral.full_name: PermaFrost NMR Mineral Oil Blend for DX Systems
dx_mineral.application: Direct expansion systems with mineral-based refrigerant oils
dx_mineral.dosage: 1 ounce per ton of cooling capacity
dx_mineral.viscosity: Similar to standard refrigeration mineral oil

dx_synthetic.name: PermaFrost NMR DX Synthetic
dx_synthetic.full_name: PermaFrost NMR POE Oil Blend for DX Systems
dx_synthetic.application: Direct expansion systems with synthetic refrigerant oils
dx_synthetic.dosage: 1 ounce per ton of cooling capacity
dx_synthetic.viscosity: Similar to standard POE refrigeration oil

chiller_mineral.name: PermaFrost NMR Chiller Mineral
chiller_mineral.full_name: PermaFrost NMR Mineral Oil Blend for Chillers
chiller_mineral.application: Chiller systems with mineral-based refrigerant oils

chiller_synthetic.name: PermaFrost NMR Chiller Synthetic
chiller_synthetic.full_name: PermaFrost NMR POE Oil Blend for Chillers
chiller_synthetic.application: Chiller systems with synthetic refrigerant oils

selection_guide.critical_rule: Oil type ALWAYS determines correct formulation - never assume based on refrigerant
common_mistakes: Assuming R-22 systems always have mineral oil (some have been converted to synthetic)
Assuming newer refrigerants always have synthetic oil
Using wrong formulation can cause cross-contamination
selection_guide.verification_method: Check equipment documentation or contact OEM to confirm oil type

cross_contamination_prevention.requirement: Separate pump/injector for mineral-based and synthetic-based systems
cross_contamination_prevention.reason: Prevents mixing of incompatible oil types in injection equipment
cross_contamination_prevention.best_practice: Label pumps clearly as 'MINERAL ONLY' or 'SYNTHETIC ONLY'

safety_data.handling: Use same precautions as handling refrigerant oils
safety_data.eye_protection: Safety glasses with side shields recommended

key_facts_for_ai: PermaFrost NMR has 5 formulations: DX Mineral, DX Synthetic, Chiller Mineral, Chiller Synthetic, Ammonia
Oil type determines formulation selection - NOT refrigerant type
DX systems: 1 oz per ton; Chillers: 10% of oil charge
Mineral formulations use naphthenic oil base; Synthetic use POE base
Separate injection equipment required for mineral vs synthetic to prevent cross-contamination
All formulations tested compatible with refrigerant groups I, II, and III
R-22 systems may have either mineral OR synthetic oil - must verify
